content: X-SW 30 Soft washer with nail Plastic membrane washer with pre-mounted nail, for attaching waterproofing membrane to concrete or masonry ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Adequate bearing surface for superior clamping of thin membranes Helps to prevent tearing or ripping of thin or soft membranes Flexible, soft plastic washer conforms to uneven surfaces 30 mm soft washer – suitable for fastening fabric waterproofing membranes to concrete surfaces Applications Attaching waterproofing membrane to concrete or masonry Attaching plastic sheeting to concrete or masonry Attaching thin membranes to concrete or masonry ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Water proofing For use with (tools): DX 2, DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6 Corrosion protection: Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm Technical Data | Application | Water proofing | For use with (tools) | DX 2, DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6 | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor, Indoor environments with temporary condensation, Outdoor temporary applications, Outdoor, rural or urban environment with low pollution, Outdoor with moderate concentration of pollution, Coastal areas, Outdoor, areas with heavy industrial pollution, Close proximity to roads, Special applications | Diameter | 1-3/16 in | Base materials | Concrete (soft), Concrete, Masonry (solid limestone brick) ### ITEMS- 2341197 -
